name: NomsTracker
0:
”Alexa, open Noms Tracker”
”Alexa, ask Noms Tracker if the cats are hungry”
”Alexa, tell Noms Tracker that I fed Fido”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noms tracker
des:
Welcome to Noms Tracker. With this skill your household can keep track of when the pets get fed! It allows both pet descriptors and pet names, and you also have the optional ability to specify the person doing the feeding.

Example:
User: "Tell Noms Tracker that John fed Fido."
Alexa: "John fed Fido, thanks."
User: "Ask Noms Tracker if Fido is hungry."
Alexa: "No, Fido was fed by John less than a minute ago."

User: "Tell Noms Tracker that I fed the cats."
Alexa: "You fed the cats, thanks."
3 hours later...
User: "Ask Noms Tracker if the cats are hungry."
Alexa: "No, someone fed the cats about three hours ago."

List of commands and examples:
Hunger check: "is the cat hungry?"
Add fed entry: "Colin fed the dog" or "I fed Spot"
Remove latest fed entry: "remove the previous entry" or "delete that last entry"
Add a new pet: "add a pet"
List your pets: "list my pets"
Remove a pet: "remove a pet"


If you want to report an issue or provide feedback, contact us by one of the following methods:
Email: anapneoconsulting@gmail.com (use a subject of "Noms Tracker Feedback")
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Noms-Tracker-1517298701687162/
Twitter: @AnapneoConsult

Designed by Eric Soderstrom and Colin Beckley
Developed by Colin Beckley
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
